author: John
title: Daily Afternoon Randomness (49 Photos)
text:
7 8 
Pat Perez followed up his win at the OHL Mayakoba with a 3rd place finish yesterday in the SBS Tournament of Champions in Hawaii. Pat Perez is now the 3rd ranked player in the world! He is playing the best golf of his life and asked me to thank the Chivers for all their support. 
When the PGA Tour hits Phoenix at the beginning of February, we are going to unleash a party never before seen on tour. Brace yourselves. 
Congrats again, Pat. The underdog is now the champion . 9 
All you need to know about how awesome Pat and his wife, Ashley, are: Ashley dawned her Fashionably Fucked Up tank from Buy Me Brunch to celebrate. True Chivers. 
Ashley just started her new Instagram ! 10
